properties.Name: RecipeInformationType
properties.Description:
Miscellaneous information of a specific type recorded for a recipe.

Ex:
- Equipment
- Operations
- Operator Qualifications
- Environmental Factors

Columns.Name: RecipeInformationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Recipe Information Type.

Columns.Name: RecipeInformationTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Recipe Information Type.

Columns.Name: RecipeInformationTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Recipe Information Type.
